column6: On his own in London, Bruce Banner watches in horror as a young woman is blown to bits right in front of him.  But she is no ordinary woman:  She is a sorceress with a strange connection to Banner, and the Hulk is the only one who can aid her rapidly fading spirit self in seeking vengeance on those who murdered her.
